name: Cavesweeper
description: Cavesweeper is a unique roguelike puzzle game that is easy to play but difficult to master. Battle deadly monsters and get powerful loot in this addictive, replayable RPG puzzler!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 15 MB available space
